select #{configId} as config_id, p.id as party_id, p.name, mtmp.is_direct_branch, p.sort_order, btmp.num as branch_count, mtmp.num as member_count, mtmp.positive_count, mtmp.s_num as student_member_count, mtmp2.t_num as teacher_member_count, mtmp2.t2_num as retire_member_count, pmgtmp.num as group_count, pmgtmp2.num as present_group_count from (select id,name,sort_order,is_deleted from ow_party
where id =#{partyId} )p left join (select count(ob.id) as num, ob.party_id from ow_branch ob
where ob.is_deleted=0 group by ob.party_id) btmp on btmp.party_id=p.id left join (select sum(if(om.type=2, 1, 0)) as s_num, sum(if(om.political_status=2, 1, 0)) as positive_count, count(om.user_id) as num, om.party_id, 0 is_direct_branch from ow_member om left join ow_branch ob on ob.id = om.branch_id where ob.is_deleted=0 and om.status=1 group by party_id union all select sum(if(om.type=2, 1, 0)) as s_num, sum(if(om.political_status=2, 1, 0)) as positive_count, count(om.user_id) as num, om.party_id, 1 is_direct_branch from ow_member om left join (select op.* from ow_party op, base_meta_type bmt where op.class_id=bmt.id and bmt.code='mt_direct_branch') as op on op.id = om.party_id where op.is_deleted=0 and om.status=1 group by party_id ) mtmp on mtmp.party_id=p.id left join (select sum(if(om.is_retire=0, 1, 0)) as t_num, sum(if(om.is_retire=1, 1, 0)) as t2_num, count(om.user_id) as num, om.party_id from ow_member_view om where type=1 and status=1 group by party_id) mtmp2 on mtmp2.party_id=p.id left join (select count(*) as num, party_id from ow_party_member_group group by party_id) pmgtmp on pmgtmp.party_id=p.id left join (select count(*) as num, party_id from ow_party_member_group where is_deleted=0 group by party_id) pmgtmp2 on pmgtmp2.party_id=p.id where p.is_deleted=0 and mtmp.num>0

select #{configId} as config_id, ob.party_id, ob.id as branch_id, 0 as is_direct_branch, op.name as party_name, ob.name, op.sort_order as party_sort_order, ob.sort_order, ob.member_count, ob.positive_count, ob.student_member_count, ob.teacher_member_count, ob.retire_member_count from (select id,name,party_id,sort_order,is_deleted,member_count,positive_count,student_member_count,teacher_member_count,retire_member_count from ow_branch_view
where party_id =#{partyId}
and id =#{branchId} )ob left join ow_party op on ob.party_id=op.id where ob.is_deleted=0 and ob.member_count>0
union all select #{configId} as config_id, op.id as party_id, null as branch_id, 1 as is_direct_branch, op.name as party_name, op.name, op.sort_order as party_sort_order, 0 as sort_order, op.member_count, op.positive_count, op.student_member_count, op.teacher_member_count, op.retire_member_count from ow_party_view op, base_meta_type bmt where op.is_deleted=0 and op.member_count>0 and op.class_id=bmt.id and bmt.code='mt_direct_branch'

select c.* from pcs_pr_candidate c, sys_user_view u
order by c.proposal_sort_order asc
select count(c.user_id) from pcs_pr_candidate c, sys_user_view u

select sum(pro_count) as pro_count, sum(stu_count) as stu_count, sum(retire_count) as retire_count, sum(female_count) as female_count, sum(minority_count) as minority_count, sum(under_fifty_count) as under_fifty_count from pcs_pr_allocate where config_id=#{configId}
select count(*) from pcs_party pp left join pcs_pr_recommend ppr on ppr.config_id=pp.config_id and ppr.stage=#{stage} and ppr.party_id = pp.party_id

select pp.*, if(par.id is null, pp.branch_count, par.branch_count) as real_branch_count, if(par.id is null, pp.member_count, par.member_count) as real_member_count, pr.stage, pr.config_id, sum(pr.expect_member_count) as expect_member_count, sum(pr.actual_member_count) as actual_member_count, par.id as report_id from pcs_party pp left join pcs_recommend pr on pr.config_id=pp.config_id and pr.stage=#{stage} and pr.party_id = pp.party_id left join pcs_admin_report par on par.party_id = pp.party_id and par.config_id=pr.config_id and par.stage=pr.stage
group by pp.sort_order desc

select count(distinct pp.party_id) from pcs_party pp left join pcs_recommend pr on pr.config_id=pp.config_id and pr.stage=#{stage} and pr.party_id = pp.party_id left join pcs_admin_report par on par.party_id = pp.party_id and par.config_id=pr.config_id and par.stage=pr.stage

select pb.*, if(par.id is null, pb.member_count, pr.member_count) as real_member_count, ${stage} as stage, pr.id as recommend_id, pr.expect_member_count, pr.actual_member_count, pr.is_finished from pcs_branch pb left join pcs_recommend pr on pr.stage=#{stage} and pr.config_id=pb.config_id and (pr.branch_id=pb.branch_id or (pb.is_direct_branch=1 and pb.party_id=pr.party_id)) left join pcs_admin_report par on par.stage=#{stage} and par.config_id = pb.config_id and par.party_id=pb.party_id
-- order by pb.member_count desc, pb.party_id asc, pb.branch_id asc order by pb.sort_order desc

select count(*) from pcs_branch pb left join pcs_recommend pr on pr.stage=#{stage} and pr.config_id=pb.config_id and (pr.branch_id=pb.branch_id or (pb.is_direct_branch=1 and pb.party_id=pr.party_id)) left join pcs_admin_report par on par.stage=#{stage} and par.config_id = pb.config_id and par.party_id=pb.party_id

select pc.*, group_concat(distinct pc.party_id) as party_ids,group_concat(distinct pc.branch_id) as branch_ids, count( pc.id) as branch_count, sum(pc.vote) total_vote, sum(pc.positive_vote) total_positive_vote, sum(pr.expect_member_count) as expect_member_count, sum(pr.actual_member_count) as actual_member_count, pcc.id as chosen_id, pcc.sort_order, if(pc.cadre_status=6, pc.cadre_sort_order, 0) as leader_sort_order from pcs_candidate pc left join pcs_recommend pr on pr.id=pc.recommend_id left join pcs_candidate_chosen pcc on pc.config_id=pcc.config_id and pc.stage=pcc.stage and pc.type=pcc.type and pc.user_id=pcc.user_id
pc.config_id=#{configId} and pc.stage=#{stage} and pc.type=#{candidateType} and pr.has_report=1
and pc.user_id=#{userId}
and pcc.id is not null
group by pc.user_id order by
branch_count desc,
total_vote desc,
total_positive_vote desc,
pcc.sort_order asc
leader_sort_order desc, branch_count desc, total_vote desc, total_positive_vote desc

select count(distinct pc.user_id) from pcs_candidate pc left join pcs_candidate_chosen pcc on pc.config_id=pcc.config_id and pc.stage=pcc.stage and pc.type=pcc.type and pc.user_id=pcc.user_id left join pcs_recommend pr on pr.id=pc.recommend_id
pc.config_id=#{configId} and pc.stage=#{stage} and pc.type=#{candidateType} and pr.has_report=1
and pc.user_id=#{userId}
and pcc.id is not null

select pc.*, group_concat(distinct pc.party_id) as party_ids, group_concat(pc.branch_id) as branch_ids, count(pc.id) as branch_count, sum(pc.vote) as total_vote, sum(pc.positive_vote) as total_positive_vote, sum(ifnull(pr.expect_member_count, 0)) as expect_member_count, sum(ifnull(pr.actual_member_count, 0)) as actual_member_count, if(isnull(c.status), -1, c.status) as cadre_status, if(pc.cadre_status=6, pc.cadre_sort_order, 0) as leader_sort_order from pcs_candidate pc left join pcs_recommend pr on pc.recommend_id=pr.id left join cadre c on c.user_id=pc.user_id
group by pc.user_id order by leader_sort_order desc, branch_count desc, total_vote desc, total_positive_vote desc
select count(distinct pc.user_id) from pcs_candidate pc

select poll_id as pollId, user_id as userId, type as type, sum(if(is_positive and status=1, 1, 0)) as positiveBallot, sum(if(status=1, 1, 0)) AS supportNum, sum(if(!is_positive and status=1, 1, 0)) as growBallot from pcs_poll_result
group by user_id order by supportNum desc, positiveBallot desc
select count(distinct user_id) from pcs_poll_result

select poll_id as pollId, candidate_user_id as userId, sum(if(status=1, 1, 0)) as supportNum, sum(if(status=1 and is_positive, 1, 0)) as positiveBallot, sum(if(status=1 and !is_positive, 1, 0)) as growBallot, sum(if(status=2, 1, 0)) as notSupportNum, sum(if(status=3, 1, 0)) as notVoteNum from pcs_poll_result where poll_id=#{pollId} and type=#{type}
and candidate_user_id = #{userId}
group by candidate_user_id
union all
select poll_id as pollId, user_id as userId, count(*) as supportNum, sum(if(is_positive, 1, 0)) as positiveBallot, sum(if(!is_positive, 1, 0)) as growBallot, 0 as notSupportNum, sum(if(status=3, 1, 0)) as notVoteNum from pcs_poll_result
and status=2 and user_id is not null
group by user_id
order by supportNum desc, positiveBallot desc

select r.user_id as userId, r.code, r.realname, r.unit, r.type as type, count(*) as branchNum, sum(r.positive_ballot) as positiveBallot,sum(r.ballot) AS supportNum, sum(r.grow_ballot) as growBallot, sum(r.disagree_ballot) as notSupportNum, sum(r.abstain_ballot) as notVoteNum from pcs_poll_report r left join pcs_poll pp on pp.id=r.poll_id
group by r.type, r.user_id order by r.type asc, supportNum desc, positiveBallot desc
